        public boolean[][] wherePlayerCanMove​(java.lang.String player,
                                      int nMoves)
        Show all the different spots where a player is allowed to move
        Parameters:
        player - The nickname of the player
        nMoves - The amount of required moves
        Returns:
        A boolean matrix where the element is true only if the player is allowed to move there

        Parameters:
        player - The nickname of the player
        nMoves - The amount of required moves
        Returns:

      • whoP1CanShootInThisEffect

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> whoP1CanShootInThisEffect​(java.lang.String offendername,
                                                             java.util.ArrayList<Player> defenders,
                                                             Effect effect,
                                                             java.util.ArrayList<Player> playersHit)
                                                      throws InvalidChoiceException
        Tells if player offender can shoot player defenders with the selected weapon
        Parameters:
        offendername - The nickname of the player who shoots
        defenders - The nickname of the players the offender wants to shoot
        effect - The effect of the weapon
        Returns:
        The players that get shot during this effect
        Throws:
        InvalidChoiceException

      • typeOfEffect

        public int typeOfEffect​(Effect effect)
        this method checks what type of effect effect is
        Parameters:
        effect - the effect to check
        Returns:
        the type of this effect. 0 = movemente effect, 1 = damage effect

      • payCostEffect

        public boolean payCostEffect​(Effect effect,
                             java.lang.String player)
        this method check if the player can pay the cost in effect, then pays it
        Parameters:
        effect - the effect we have to see to pay his cost
        player - the player who has to pay
        Returns:
        true if player pays, false if the player can't pay

      • makeMovementEffect

        public void makeMovementEffect​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playersWhoMoveNames,
                               Effect effect,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> xPos,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> yPos,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Player> playersHit,
                               java.lang.String offenderName)
                        throws InvalidChoiceException
        This method is called by ShootWithMovement() and makes the actual effect of movement
        Parameters:
        playersWhoMoveNames - is the player being moved
        effect - is the movement effect we have to look at
        xPos - is the x position of the player after he moved
        yPos - is the y position of the player after he moved
        Throws:
        InvalidChoiceException

      • makeDamageEffect

        public void makeDamageEffect​(java.lang.String offendername,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Player> defenders_temp,
                             Effect effect,
                             java.lang.String defenderToApplyTargeting,
                             boolean targetingFinallyApplied)
        This method is called by ShootWithMovemente() and ShootWithMovemente() and makes the actual effect of damage
        Parameters:
        offendername - is the player who makes damage
        defenders_temp - are the players who receive damage

      • shootWithMovement

        public boolean shootWithMovement​(java.lang.String offenderName,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> defendersNames,
                                 Weapon weapon,
                                 java.lang.Integer[] chosenOrder,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> xPosition,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> yPosition,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playersWhoMoveNames,
                                 java.lang.String defenderToApplyTargeting)
        This method, called from the controller, makes the actual shooting of the weapon with movement effects
        Parameters:
        offenderName - is the player who uses the weapon
        defendersNames - are the players who receive the effects
        weapon - is the weapon being used to shoot
        chosenOrder - is the order of the effect chose by the user
        xPosition - is the new x position of the player being moved
        yPosition - is the new y position of the player being moved
        playersWhoMoveNames - is the player who moves
        Returns:
        return true if all the checks on the effects are executed the right way
        Throws:
        InvalidChoiceException

      • clientSnapshot

        public java.lang.String clientSnapshot()
        this method creates a snapshot for the client, the first string is what all the players see: kst, gameMap,playernames. The second string represent the players object the return type of the method is an array, if you want the json you need to stick the two String
        Returns:
        the client snapshot

      • modelSnapshot

        public java.lang.String modelSnapshot()
        this method creates a snapshot of the game in a string representing a json file
        Returns:
        the string containing json game

      • p1SeeP2

        public boolean p1SeeP2​(int x1,
                       int y1,
                       int x2,
                       int y2)
        tells if p1 on spot(x1,y1) can see p2 on (x2,y2)
        Returns:
        true if p1 can see p2
